ingredients.ingredient: 1 tablespoon prepared yellow mustard, or to taste
2 ounces thinly sliced Montreal smoked meat
¼ cup shredded Mexican cheese blend
¼ cup vegetable oil for frying

cookingTips: Spread condiments thinly to avoid oversaturation of the tortilla
Warm the smoked meat gently before wrapping for better flavor distribution
Fry the wrap seam-side down first to seal it before flipping
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a fusion wrap combining Montreal smoked meat with Mexican flavors. How would you cook it to get a crispy exterior while heating through evenly?
